about_the_game:
Journey through a Jazz Age mystery draped in gothic stylings as you take on the last case of Benedict Fox. Fight demons, explore the subconscious, and solve puzzles in a twisted world of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded murders.

Inspired by Lovecraft, noir, and 20th-century jazz, the world of Benedict Fox is a beautiful and multi-faceted experience. Explore the art deco mansion, meet a unique cast of characters, face off against demonic creatures, and descend into twisted memories in limbo. From concept to final design, The Last Case of Benedict Fox Digital Art Book showcases the artistic development of this beautiful Metroidvania.

Featuring artwork by:
Paweł Czapla
Jakub Plewniok
Jula Arendt
Julia Szydełko
Bożydar Chorąży
Przemysław Miziołek
